TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi KeyValueConfigurationElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Docs.summary: Represents a configuration element that contains a key/value pair.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The KeyValueConfigurationElement object inherits from the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> base class. The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> object represents an element within a configuration file. The KeyValueConfigurationElement object can belong in a <xref:System.Configuration.KeyValueConfigurationCollection> collection.
